title: Ringo1
author: Ringo1
content: Hi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMI realize its a huge scheme, Oh... I thought I almost read I realized it's a huge scam. Scheme and scam sounding alike Â Pyramid stuff don't look reliable. They are appearing Ponzi and reliable on the introduction and registration of another person to grow is not what guarantee a survival. I can stay by the side on this and not get involve.

comments.author: Ringo1
comments.body: I agree man, but in 5 days, I will have doubled my money and will take them out ) As long as you put in an amount you can afford to lose, its acceptable to me )

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me That is what a ponzi scheme is,the first investors get paid with money made from the latest investors and when the turn to pay the late investors has come and the site has no new entries then the website makes an exit scam.That is what the website you are describing by your post,which I highly suggest everyone to stay away.

comments.author: lule29
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMI realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me I wouldn't advise anyone to enter. You never know when is the end to that scam even If it may appear that it has only started. The idea of making fast money is tempting but it will cost you all the money you already have. Be wise.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMThere is a "pyramid" on the rise.Pyramid schemes are not new and people are scamming others through them. It may sound interesting, but the fact is that only the starter/owner of these schemes gets benefits from them and the rest of the people just lose their money and never recover their seed money.I would advise everyone not to get greedy and stay away from this OP offer of this pyramid scheme.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me This is a Ponzi scheme and nothing more, it is being disguised as some form of gambling but it is a known scam that has been around for a long time, also it is obvious that you are aware about its nature as in your post you say that if this scam last for long enough you could make some money, so you know that such a thing cannot last for long, and it cannot last for long because those that deposited early make money out of those that came after them. By trying to spread this scam you are becoming a scammer as well, and even if you made money out of this, which I doubt unless you are the one that created the scheme, all of it would come from scamming other people, something that is simply unacceptable to me.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.created_time: May 14, 2022, 06:55:33 PMLast edit: May 14, 2022, 07:36:40 PM by acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMI realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me to anyone who might get interested in messaging this guy, don't! if you did you are just risking yourself being scammed. anyone who tries to introduce/encourages someone to an obvious pyramid scam should not and never be trusted.Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 05:02:19 PMI agree man, but in 5 days, I will have doubled my money and will take them out ) As long as you put in an amount you can afford to lose, its acceptable to me )for you maybe it is acceptable. it doesn't matter if you can afford to lose the money you are going to invest. it is extremely stupid to invest in something that is obviously a scam.

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me Classic ponzi scheme- offering a service to double your money in a relatively faster method which requires a minimum deposit.To all the people contemplating whether they should try or attempt to invest in a ponzi scheme or any related deposits such as this, avoid it at all cost. Based purely from my experience, ponzi-schemes are attractive enough to get the attention of newbies and ultimately invest on their website. On the first few days, you can actually see your investments increasing but after a week, the website will start to crash, thereby causing you to lose everything on the process.That is why, I really warn everyone to avoid these kinds of projects as it would only lead to one result- you losing your precious resources and/or capital.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me Sorry I'll forget the phone number offer. That's not very good for us. After all, there are many online casino sites that we have on this forum with high reputations and guaranteeing anything from a security point of view. btw, you seem to be offering something abstract and nobody wants you to put it here.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMThere is a "pyramid" on the rise.Ringo, the pyramids are far too enormous for me to understand. Even so, it sounds like there's something stinky in them. It's probably some rotting guy who died waiting in a queue for a new sucker to make his first trip to the pyramid.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Ponzi scam or do I say Ponzi scheme does not encourage on this forum at that I will not put in my intellectual time to write any thing on this thread since it amounts to a total was of time bit one thing I will like to make clear to whoever is reading this comment is that Ponzi scheme is a system that is robbing Paul to pay Peter which bubble must burst at some point for your mental sanity stay away from such investment.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me Please don't promote 'schemes' that you already know is pyramiding. Regardless of how much you can earn with that, pyramiding itself is and will always be a scam. Just with the fact that there is a MINIMUM ENTRY FEE required already proves it to be something we should be cautious with. Hence, you just basically promotes scam despite knowing it will end a scam.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me It's an easy way to make money for early birds but also an easy way to lose money for latecomers, Ponzi scheme thrives on referring people because that is how it really works, so if no more people and money come in the operators just shut it down and they just launch a new Ponzi scheme and invite you to be their early birds.You made a profit because you are an early bird but those you are inviting now are likely to lose money, everyone who promote Ponzi Scheme are red-tagged here, no wonder your profile is showing red.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on May 14, 2022, 08:35:04 PMPlease don't promote 'schemes' that you already know is pyramiding. Regardless of how much you can earn with that, pyramiding itself is and will always be a scam. Just with the fact that there is a MINIMUM ENTRY FEE required already proves it to be something we should be cautious with. Hence, you just basically promotes scam despite knowing it will end a scam.I hope people won't be tempted to join this kind of scheme.Better use your $100 for other things that you can very well benefit of.Because here, more than likely, you will never get your initial investments.Their offer is tempting, the reason why they can get naive users. But if you have seen this countless times, you won't fall for this trap anymore.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me You are in international forum in which Pyramiding is an obvious known as scam so where on earth do you believe that there will even 1 of us here that will send you a PM to be a victim of that same scam ?anyway you earned what you are looking for and now being tagged.Please be aware that though a risky thing is much profitable ? but never to a known to be scam scheme because you will surely lose your money in the end.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMHi guys,There is a "pyramid" on the rise.Basically you make a registration on a website, which requires only an username, password and phone number.The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withIf you can get people to enter using your unique invitation code, you get bonuses.I realize its a huge scheme, but if it lasts for enough time, you can manage to get yourself a nice amount on top of your money.Anyone interested - message me When ROI is more, remember the risk involved will be also more.There canât be any investments where returns will be more without any risk.And here the case is just 5 days, by reading only anyone can say that this is a Ponzi scheme.At first they know that people are gonna try with small amounts, so they will surely pay them out. (This is called initial investments made by the site to grab more big investors). Once the investors gain trust from the site, they invest more and this time big amount. The site waits for it and hence does an exit scam.Itâs always advised to not go for these types of scheme, and donât try to make yourself rich overnight.Act wisely and invest cautiously.Good luck everyone.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 03:23:58 PMThere is a "pyramid" on the rise...The entry fee is minimum of 100 USDT. Each day you enter the website and "make 50 spins" you get 4% on the amount you have entered with.In around 20-25 days you double the amount of USDT you have entered withQuote from: Ringo1 on May 14, 2022, 05:02:19 PMI agree man, but in 5 days, I will have doubled my money and will take them out :)) As long as you put in an amount you can afford to lose, its acceptable to me )I don't know how you are so stupid as to advertise such a system and call it a pyramid. Those of us who have been doing this for a long time don't fall for this kind of traps but they are usually more sophisticated so that people who are not so experienced are more likely to fall for them.Apart from that you are dumb enough to put figures that are not consistent, first you talk about 20-25 days to double your money and you say that you double it in 5. No, no need to answer me, I am used to see you scammers trying to explain the unexplainable when your garbage arguments are dismantled.

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: I hate the word pyramiding I was victimized by this kind of scheme I was late investing and after investing a large amount of money the site closed down a few days I did not even cashout a cent, even if you have a warning in your post, it's still inviting people to lose their money, I know the need for you to invite because if you cannot invite people to invest money where they will likely to lose their money, you deserve to get tagged this forum will not tolerate this kind of investment.

comments.author: P2PECS
comments.body: Hey guys!In case anyone is reading this and is doubting whether to PM him to make money, I want to make one thing clear:Someone who promises you an easy way to double your money is scamming you.Please do not fall into the trap.
